description: This file defines the PlayerRepository class which manages a singleton ExoPlayer instance, allowing setting media URIs and releasing resources. It serves as an abstraction layer over ExoPlayer to simplify media playback management within an Android application.

classes.name: PlayerRepository
classes.description: A repository that manages a singleton ExoPlayer instance, allowing media setup and resource management.

methods.name: setMediaUri
methods.description: Sets a media item from the provided URI to the player and prepares it for playback.

methods.name: release
methods.description: Releases the ExoPlayer resources and resets the player instance.
